Based on the contextual information provided, here is a summary of the locations of the various schools and colleges that are part of Texas A&M University:

The main Texas A&M University campus is located in College Station, Texas. This is where the majority of the colleges and schools are based, including:

- College of Engineering
- College of Veterinary Medicine and Biomedical Sciences
- College of Medicine
- College of Nursing
- College of Pharmacy
- School of Public Health

Texas A&M University also has additional campuses and locations:

- Texas A&M University at Galveston
- Texas A&M University at Qatar

The document mentions that Texas A&M University "extends beyond the main campus in College Station" and has multiple "campuses & locations", but does not provide a comprehensive list of all the specific school/college locations across the different campuses.

Based on the contextual information provided from the Embry-Riddle Aeronautical University website, here is a summary of the key points about the cost of attending ERAU:

1. The costs and tuition presented are "an estimate and may not reflect all costs and expenses incurred while attending your respective campus." The actual costs can vary.

2. Embry-Riddle "reserves the right to increase or modify tuition and fees without prior notice, upon approval by the Board or as otherwise consistent with Board policy and to make such modifications applicable to students enrolled at the respective campuses."

3. The website provides information about tuition and estimated costs, but does not list specific dollar amounts. It indicates these costs can be found in "other University publications or webpages."

4. The website encourages prospective students to review the "Tuition and Estimated Costs" page for the most up-to-date information on the expenses associated with attending Embry-Riddle.

So in summary, the contextual information does not provide definitive cost figures, but indicates that tuition and fees at Embry-Riddle are subject to change and that students should refer to the university's published materials for the latest estimated costs. The website emphasizes the need to check the official Tuition and Estimated Costs page for the most accurate and current information.

Based on the contextual information provided, here is a summary of the admission timelines for the different universities and programs mentioned:

Texas A&M University College of Engineering:
- Early Action Deadline: October 15, 2024
- Applicants with a complete admission file by the Early Action Deadline will receive a decision by mid-December 2024.
- The document mentions that applicants should apply early to allow time to complete their entire application by the deadline.

Embry-Riddle Aeronautical University:
- U.S. citizens and permanent residents should apply at least 60 days prior to the beginning of classes for the semester of application.
- International applicants should apply at least 90 days prior to the beginning of classes for the semester of application.
- The website encourages prospective students to apply for admission at any time, but urges them to do so early.

Texas A&M University (general):
- On average, it takes 3-5 business days from the time an application is successfully submitted for Texas A&M to receive it.
- Prospective students can submit applications through Common App or ApplyTexas, and the application platform will not affect the admission decision.

So in summary, the key admission timelines highlighted are:
- Texas A&M College of Engineering: Early Action Deadline of October 15, 2024
- Embry-Riddle: At least 60 days (US) or 90 days (international) prior to the start of the semester
- Texas A&M (general): Application processing takes 3-5 business days

Let me know if you need any clarification or have additional questions!

Role: user, Content: how to apply to texas a&m at galveston

Application Deadlines:
- The application period is August 1, 2024 - May 1, 2025.
- The final application deadline is May 1, 2025.
- All other required documents will be accepted through May 15, 2025.
- If the application deadline falls on a weekend, the Common Application and ApplyTexas will remain open until 11:59 p.m. CST on the following Monday. Required documents will be accepted until 5 p.m. CST on that Monday.

- There is no preference between the two application platforms - both will be accepted.
